title: Regulation (ECSC, EEC, Euratom) No 1545/73 of the Council of 4 June 1973 amending Council Regulation (Euratom, ECSC, EEC) No 549/69 determining the categories of officials and other servants of the European Communities to whom the provisions of Article 12, the second paragraph of Article 13, and Article 14 of the Protocol on the Privileges and Immunities of the Communities apply
header:
11.6.1973 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 155/7
REGULATION (ECSC, EEC, EURATOM) NO 1545/73 OF THE COUNCIL
of 4 June 1973
amending Council Regulation (Euratom, ECSC, EEC) No 549/69 determining the categories of officials and other servants of the European Communities to whom the provisions of Article 12, the second paragraph of Article 13, and Article 14 of the Protocol on the Privileges and Immunities of the Communities apply
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 4 June 1973.
For the Council
The President
R. VAN ELSLANDE
